title: For the Love of Lauralee
description: Dante Quinn doesn't believe in gypsy magic, but that doesn't mean he s not cursed. When the police question him regarding stolen items from his law school building, Dante decides to find the Roma woman and demand that she remove the suggestion of the curse from him before he gets arrested for thievery.Lauralee Murphy doesn't know that Dante Quinn is a suspect in a recent rash of burglaries; she only knows that there is a lot of monkey business afoot and eagerly agrees to help the reasoned and self-restrained young lawyer find the gypsy woman, if only to purchase ... a love potion.
author: C.J. Love
